title: project core
body:
Hi im Ogarotth,
I had project yasuo in the disruption cache and have 10 project core and need 11 to fuse project yasuo. I was earning money to buy as he project chest and get one more project core but when i get to 750 ip the projects chests wasn't here anymore. So i'm asking for riot to put the projects chest back until this night at 23H59. Please, i just need 1 more project core.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: The [Project Disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) event is over, meaning it won't be possible to obtain more project cores.  Project Yasuo will still be available through normal means and hextech crafting, though!  Take heart!
So can they just put the price of project  yasuo at 10 project cores?
The even ended on [August 16 at 23:59 ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/ending-soon/first-strike)and I don't think they will be able to extend it for you.
